briefdescription.para: Sets the exec. ID and failure parameters in the conf. file.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Exec
Execution metadata.
restart
Value to set in the conf. file (0 or 1).
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function sets the execution ID and failure parameters in the configuration file. This is to avoid forcing the user to change these values manually in case of recovery needed. In this way, relaunching the execution in the same way as the initial time will make FTI detect that it is a restart. It also allows to set the failure parameter back to 0 at the end of a successful execution.

briefdescription.para: It reads the configuration given in the configuration file.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Exec
Execution metadata.
FTI_Topo
Topology metadata.
FTI_Ckpt
Checkpoint metadata.
FTI_Inje
Type to describe failure injections in FTI.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function reads the configuration given in the FTI configuration file and sets other required parameters.

briefdescription.para: It tests that the configuration given is correct.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Topo
Topology metadata.
FTI_Ckpt
Checkpoint metadata.
FTI_Exec
Execution metadata.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function tests the FTI configuration to make sure that all parameter's values are correct.

briefdescription.para: It tests that the directories given is correct.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Topo
Topology metadata.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function tests that the directories given in the FTI configuration are correct.

briefdescription.para: It creates the directories required for current execution.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Exec
Execution metadata.
FTI_Topo
Topology metadata.
FTI_Ckpt
Checkpoint metadata.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function creates the temporary metadata, local and global directories required for the current execution.

briefdescription.para: It reads and tests the configuration given.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Conf
Configuration metadata.
FTI_Exec
Execution metadata.
FTI_Topo
Topology metadata.
FTI_Ckpt
Checkpoint metadata.
FTI_Inje
Type to describe failure injections in FTI.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function reads the configuration file. Then test that the configuration parameters are correct (including directories).
